settings.title: Thanet's Trade Power Tool Supplier Since 1996
settings.paragraph_1: Our Ramsgate branch at The Oaks Business Park sits at the heart of Thanet, serving tradespeople across Margate, Ramsgate, Broadstairs, Birchington, Westgate-on-Sea and Minster. Whether you're working on the Margate seafront regeneration, fitting out retail units at Westwood Cross, or renovating period properties in Broadstairs, Invicta Tools is your local authorised Makita and DeWalt dealer.
settings.paragraph_2: Thanet's diverse building landscape — from Victorian seaside architecture to modern commercial developments at Manston and Eurokent — means tradespeople need a supplier that stocks the full range. We carry everything from cordless kits and power tool accessories to hand tools, fixings, adhesives, sealants and PPE. One stop, one invoice, one supplier who knows the trade.
settings.paragraph_3: With our Ramsgate branch centrally located for all of Thanet, most tradespeople are within 10 minutes of our door. We also offer free delivery over £30 across all CT9–CT12 postcodes for when ordering online suits your schedule better. Trade accounts available — speak to our team about setting one up.

settings.title: Need Tools in Thanet?
settings.subtitle: Call our Ramsgate branch for expert advice, or shop online with free delivery over £30.
